Reviews.Title: “Nouvel Hotel, Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Sheela H
Reviews.Content: stayed nouvel hotel week leading easter 2012 single traveller staff friendly welcoming hotel centrally located las easily accessible sightseeing hotel relatively quiet night bit dated fresh coat paint plus smelt musty bed pillow extremely uncomfortable wifi costs 2 hour continuously hour loses internet connection couldnt reconnect unless paid wish watch tv 20 euro deposit required tv control duration stay whilst hotel centrally located looks attractive front rate 4 star hotel
